metadata.name: Ep.2. Slave Ship
metadata.description:
2nd Ep. from 13 « 4 Black Guys Epic » series which tells the story of 4 black brothers through space and time from ancient african roots to future in outer space. These artworks telling the search for american dream meeting issues like unfair justice, racism, violence and false democracy.

This particular artwork illustrates the crossing of ocean in a slave ship. Pain, Fear, Anger and Death. This NFT will become a real painting shown in galleries in U.S and Europe. Buying this one you will be the first one getting a piece of what will become a artistical myth.
